title: Redevelopment agreement for 100 N. Euclid TIF

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #95		INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOSEPH RODDY  An Ordinance affirming adoption of a redevelopment plan, redevelopment area, and redevelopment project; authorizing the execution of redevelopment agreement between the City of St. Louis and City Walk on Euclid, L.L.C. for redevelopment of the 100 North Euclid Redevelopment Area; prescribing the form and details of said agreement; designating City Walk on Euclid, L.L.C. as developer of the redevelopment area; making certain findings with respect thereto; authorizing other related actions in connection with the redevelopment of certain property within the redevelopment area; and containing a severability clause.
